urls.title: Facebook URLs
urls.description: Enter Facebook URLs to fetch data from (one per line)

maxItems.title: Maximum items to fetch
maxItems.description: Maximum number of items to fetch per URL

waitForSelector.title: Wait for selector
waitForSelector.description: CSS selector to wait for before scraping (optional)

cookies.title: Facebook Cookies (Recommended)
cookies.description: Facebook authentication cookies for accessing private content. Export from browser developer tools (F12 → Application → Cookies → facebook.com). Supports JSON array format or cookie header string.

email.title: Facebook Email (Fallback)
email.description: Facebook login email - used as fallback if cookies are not provided or invalid. Note: Email/password login may trigger security checks.

password.title: Facebook Password (Fallback)
password.description: Facebook login password - used as fallback if cookies are not provided or invalid

useLoginBypass.title: Use Login Bypass
useLoginBypass.description: Attempt to bypass login requirements using technical methods (limited effectiveness)
